successes.title: iSketchnote: Give Digital Life to your Paper Creations.
successes.description: Give a digital life to your paper creations with iSketchnote. Put any kind of paper or notebook on it and draw your imagination. Your creations are magically digitized in real time!

Pledges.description:
HALL OF FAME
Every iSketchnote backer is welcome! Thank you very much for believing in this project. You will receive backer-only updates, have the opportunity to co-design the app with our community, and have your name put on our giant backer’s Sketchnote that will be broadcast on our website and on other social media.

ISKETCHNOTE PEN
Get the first set of iSketchnote pens! We created a contemporary set of THREE design pens with a smart, chic, and trendy look. One black ballpoint + one orange felt + one black felt. Use it with your future iSketchnote cover or on your favorite notebook. PLUS Backer-only updates PLUS co-design the app PLUS giant backer’s Sketchnote.

ISKETCHNOTE EARLY BIRDS
The first 200 backers get a complete iSketchnote pack for the crazy early bird Kickstarter price of just $119!!! That means you are saving $70 off the expected retail price for one iSketchnote Cover PLUS three iSketchnote pens! We can only offer a limited number at this price, so get ready to share your iSketchnotes with your friends! PLUS Backer-only updates PLUS co-design the app PLUS giant backer’s Sketchnote.
We'll cover the shipping cost anywhere in the world!

ISKETCHNOTE
Weren’t able to get an early bird reward? Not a problem! You can still get a complete iSketchnote pack for the crazy Kickstarter price of just $149!!! It means that you are saving $40 off the expected retail price for one iSketchnote Cover PLUS three iSketchnote pens! We can only offer a limited number at this price, so get ready to share your iSketchnotes with your friends! PLUS Backer-only updates PLUS co-design the app PLUS giant backer’s Sketchnote.

ISKETCHNOTE FOR IPAD MINI iSketchnote cover for iPad Mini! Especially for our supporters who expressly ask for it! PLUS three iSketchnote pens PLUS Backer-only updates PLUS co-design the app PLUS giant backer’s Sketchnote

ISKETCHNOTE DEVELOPERS Especially for developers who want to build their own app! We'll provide a complete iSketchnote pack plus an EARLY API ACCESS and technical support from our team to help you to get started!PLUS Backer-only updates PLUS co-design the app PLUS giant backer’s Sketchnote. We'll cover the shipping cost anywhere in the world!

ISKETCHNOTE FOR IPAD + ISKETCHNOTE FOR IPAD MINI Especially for our supporters who expressly ask for it! You’ll get both iSketchnote for iPad and iPad mini for the crazy Kickstarter price of just $279!!! It means 2 covers with two sets of iSketchnote pens PLUS Backer-only updates PLUS co-design the app PLUS giant backer’s Sketchnote.

ISKETCHNOTE PIONEERS
Every backer will have the opportunity to be part of the app development community. But being an iSketchnote Pioneer means that you will have the opportunity to be part of ALL of the development process! You get privileged access to Timothee and all the rest of the team. In addition, if you can make it to the next CES 2014 in Las Vegas, you will get the chance to test the iSketchnote beta version and have a French-style dinner with the team while you’re there! PLUS $149 Reward PLUS Backer-only updates PLUS co-design the app PLUS giant backer’s Sketchnote.
